timeline.bodyText:
This is redundant not because synchronization is not needed, but because it's already surrounded by synchronized (failedIrreversibleOperationDescriptions).
Maybe introduce a local Object lock instead of synchronizing on lists?
timeline.author: findepi

replies.bodyText:
Maybe introduce a local Object lock instead of synchronizing on lists?

What's the advantage?
replies.author: sopel39

timeline.author: findepi
findepi

timeline.message:
Remove redundant synchronization

All threads already synchronize on
failedIrreversibleOperationDescriptions
so this nested synchronization is not needed
Make it explicit that none of the futures should fail
